Isabella Rodriguez.description: conversing about setting up a quiet spot at Hobbs Cafe for Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller to discuss Klaus's paper, with Isabella Rodriguez helping and offering to provide coffee for the meeting. @ <persona> Maria Lopez
chat: Isabella Rodriguez
Maria, I couldn't help but notice the fire in the cooking area earlier. Is everything okay now?
Maria Lopez
Yes, everything is under control now. Thank you for your concern.
Isabella Rodriguez
I'm glad to hear that everything is under control. Let me know if you need any help with anything.
Maria Lopez
Thank you for your offer, Isabella. I appreciate it. Actually, I wanted to discuss something else with you. Do you have a minute?
Isabella Rodriguez
Of course, Maria. I have a minute. What did you want to discuss?
Maria Lopez
I wanted to chat about Klaus Mueller. We're meeting later to discuss his paper at Hobbs Cafe. Could you make sure we have a quiet spot to talk?
Isabella Rodriguez
Sure, Maria. I'll make sure we have a quiet spot for you and Klaus to talk later.
Maria Lopez
Thank you, Isabella. I really appreciate your help with setting up a quiet spot for us. I'll make sure to give you a heads up when Klaus arrives.
Isabella Rodriguez
Great, Maria. I'll make sure to reserve a quiet spot for you and Klaus later. Just let me know when he arrives.
Maria Lopez
Thank you, Isabella. I'll make sure to keep you posted once Klaus arrives.
Isabella Rodriguez
I'll be sure to keep an eye out for Klaus's arrival and prep the quiet spot for your meeting.
Maria Lopez
Thank you again, Isabella. I'll head back to my table now and wait for Klaus to arrive.
Isabella Rodriguez
Let me know if you need anything else before the meeting. I want to make sure everything goes smoothly.
Maria Lopez
Thank you Isabella, I appreciate all your help.
Isabella Rodriguez
Is there anything specific you need for the meeting with Klaus, Maria?
Maria Lopez
I just need a quiet spot and maybe some coffee for the meeting. Thank you for your help, Isabella.

Klaus Mueller.description: still at the library, writing his paper (on the way to still at the library, writing his pape) @ the Ville:Oak Hill College:library:library table
